name: Socratic Method
description:
It's been a while since you've left your room.

In this narrative-driven puzzle game, out-logic a quirky cast of characters as you learn about what it means to be truly alive.

THEME

This jam's theme was: Share Knowledge. Through each encounter, you'll re-learn why life is such a complicated journey, using the knowledge and feelings that are shared with you throughout.

CREDITS

Made with love by Brendan, Venser, and Dino for Backtrace's 2021 Game Jam.

Music is by the wonderful HeatleyBros! (@ https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsLlqLIE-TqDq3lh5kU2PeA)

JAM INFORMATION
  • Backtrace project instance: https://acedgames.sp.backtrace.io/p/gamejam-bt/overview
